N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 343.9 - Notification of determination and required affirmation

State Regulations
(a) Notified in writing. If the director
determines that the requirements of sections
343.5, 343.6, 343.7
and
343.8
of this Part have been
satisfied, the applicant will be notified in writing that it has been
conditionally approved as a certified provider of an alcohol awareness program
for youth, pending receipt of a properly signed affirmation statement in
accordance with subdivision (b) of this section. (b) Required affirmation. Such notice shall
include a statement of affirmation that must be signed by the applicant and
returned to the division. (1)

The affirmation
shall state that in addition to the requirements of this Part, the program
provider agrees to the following: (i) to
submit resumes of all new instructors to the division at least two weeks before
such instructors commence instruction; (ii)
to administer evaluations on forms
provided by the division to program participants for completion, and to mail
all completed evaluations to the division within seven days of such
completion; (iii)
to grant the
division access to the program so that classes can be monitored at any
time; (iv)
to furnish the division
with a schedule of all classes, indicating the locations, times, and dates of
such classes; (v) to adhere to all
standards set forth in this notice of requirements in accordance with section
343.6
(b) of this

Part; and
(vi)
to make a good faith
effort to ensure that learning objectives, as set forth in the notice of
requirements in accordance with section
343.6
(b) of this

Part, are achieved. (2)

The affirmation shall also state that the program provider acknowledges the
following: (i) that the division may change
requirements for the program at any time, upon notice to the program provider, and may require that such changes be incorporated into the program in a timely
fashion; and
(ii)
that contents of
the provider's curriculum may be shared with the division, with other certified
providers of an alcohol awareness program for youth, or with applicants for
such certification. (c) Certificate. Upon receipt of a properly
signed affirmation statement, the director shall forward a certificate to the
approved certified provider of an alcohol awareness program for
youth. (d) Explanation of
disapproval. If the determination of the director is not to approve an
applicant as a certified provider of an alcohol awareness program for youth, the applicant will be notified in writing of the reason(s) therefor. Notes
